name: Hungry Hunter
description:
Game created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, This is my first game jam.

Made in 7 days. 

All assets made by me.  (Except fonts)

You are a hunter living next to a village who is desperately malnourished, you have to consume a piece of food before tomorrow morning breaks the day. You may do this task by any means necessary, as long as you don't starve. You have a rifle with four bullets to protect yourself and a companion bee-dog named Gerald, he is a light source and has extra bullets in a bag attached to his back. If you stay in the dark too long you are at great risk, no one knows what strange creatures lurk in the dark.

Good luck Mr. Player.
